cover.title: Easily Rate EOS Block Producers
cover.paragraph1: EOS Rate is an open-source dApp that allows EOS token holders to rate Block Producers in just a few clicks.
cover.paragraph2: Global ratings help capture collective opinion, or “wisdom of the crowd” and measure if voter sentiment is reflected in voting patterns.

subTopic.title: Liquid Democracy
subTopic.paragraph1: Find the Block Producer that best represents you.
subTopic.paragraph2: EOS Rate was built by a community that believes in transparency. The tool generates profile pages of the Block Producers. It uses a unique radial component we call “LEAF” (Liquid EOS Attribute Factors) to help you visually compare the most relevant qualitative attributes of Block Producers, making it easier for token holders to make an informed vote.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Compliance with disclosure of ownership, complete bp.json, use of rewards, and financial stats.

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure
infrastructure.description: Stability and reliability of the EOS infrastructure.

trustiness.title: Trustiness
trustiness.description: Collaboration and reputation among the EOS community.

community.title: Community
community.description: Community value creation through education and promoting talks, chats, hackathons, conferences, seminars, developer spaces, and other useful content.

development.title: Development
development.description: Technical know-how and usage of open-source software, scripts, frameworks, wallets, voting portals, metrics, etc.
